refnamediv.refpurpose: Lists all existing paths that start from the specified combinations and end at a primitive shape.

refsection.title: DESCRIPTION
refsection.para: Lists all existing paths that start from the specified combinations and end at a primitive shape.

refsection.title: EXAMPLES
refsection.para: The example shows the use of the pathlist command to list all paths that start from the given combinations and end at a primitive shape.

example.title: List all paths that start from given combinations and end at a primitive shape.
example.para: Lists all existing paths that start from the combinations group1 and region2 and end at primitive shapes.

refsection.title: BUG REPORTS
refsection.para: Reports of bugs or problems should be submitted via electronic mail to <devs@brlcad.org>, or via the "cadbug.sh" script.
